Package persistence.json.adventure

Interface AdventureDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdventureAPIDAO, AdventureJsonDAO
public interface AdventureDAO
Interface that abstracts the persistence of adventures from uppers.

In particular, it follows the Data Access Object design pattern, which is commonly used to abstract persistence implementations with a set of generic operations.

    checkUniqueName(String name)
    Method that checks whether the adventure's name introduced by the user already exists in the system.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      ArrayList<Adventure> getAll()
      Method that reads the persisted information of all adventures.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all the adventures

    • save

      void save(Adventure adventure) throws PersistenceException
      Method that saves a specific adventure, persisting its information.
      Parameters:
      adventure - the adventure to save
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - if something goes wrong when persisting (writing to the file)

    • checkUniqueName

      boolean checkUniqueName(String name)
      Method that checks whether the adventure's name introduced by the user already exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the name inputted by the user
      Returns:
      a boolean representation of weather the name is unique or not.
